details.title: NTSC
details.description: Develop & maintain large scale ReactJS app using Redux and Material UI. Create Read Update Delete (CRUD) modules by handling complex API's. Create Generic/dynamic components, implement documentation of npm libraries. Resolving complex bugs, problem solving and use analytical skills to provide end-to-end solutions. Coordinate with Project Manager and Dubai based team to get users a seam less experience from the front end side

details.title: SIANTY CMS
details.description: Develop & maintain large scale ReactJS app using Redux, typescript and Material UI. Create Read Update Delete (CRUD) modules by handling complex API's. Create Generic/dynamic components, implement documentation of npm libraries. Resolving complex bugs, problem solving and use analytical skills to provide end-to-end solutions. Coordinate with Project Manager and Dubai based team to get users a seam less experience from the front end side

details.title: Halal Hangouts
details.description: Develop GatsbyJS-WordPress headless CMS with Front-End built on GatsbyJS and backend on WordPress and blog posts data rendering with GraphQL API.
details.tech: ReactJS, GatsbyJS, Material UI, WordPress, JavaScript
